message: The xml:id of the TEI element should be equal to the name of the file, without the file extension. Currently the value of xml:id is "step_PiaOSDCtRotME_020218" whilst the file name is "step_PiaOSDCtRotME_020218.xml"
TEI/@type should be either "researchScenario" or "researchStep". The current value of TEI/@type is "researchStep"

test: tei:date and tei:persName and tei:affiliation and tei:desc
message: When recording a revision, some precise metadata must be given : the date of the revision, the name of the responsibe and his/her affiliation and a description.

nodeText: Présenter le résultat de l'édition musicale dans un CMS open source.
message: The title of a step should describe the action to perform, starting or ending with a gerund (or an infinitive), or a noun .

nodeText:
If the published musical corpus is a critical edition
      which is expected to be dynamic, publish on Omeka and VexFlow. Otherwise, for instance in case
      of a library of music scores, publish on Omeka and Verovio (Verovio doesn't support dynamic
      critical notes for now). It is also possible to use Tikit, a customised distribution of Omeka
      with Verovio as a preconfigured plugin.
message: In the <desc type="definition>, there should be nothing more than text, <list> and <ref>.

nodeText:
Si le corpus musical à publier est une édition critique
      que l'on veut dynamique, publier avec Omeka et VexFlow. Autrement, dans le cas d'une
      bibliothèque de partitions par exemple, publier avec Omeka et Verovio (actuellement Verovio ne
      supporte pas les notes critiques dynamiques). Il est également possible d'utiliser TiKit, une
      distribution personnalisée d'Omeka avec le plugin Verovio préconfiguré.
message: In the <desc type="definition>, there should be nothing more than text, <list> and <ref>.

The main sponsor of the SSK is the PARTHENOS project. All scenarios and steps should record this information.
sourceDesc in mandatory in TEI, so if you want to give details on the way the scenario was conceived, it is the appropriate location.
